text: Jerry Vale (born Gennaro Luigi Vitaliano; July 8, 1930 â€“ May 18, 2014) was an American singer. He was known for his soft Italian voice. He made many albums some of them included Innamorata, You Don't Know Me, Old Cape Cod, and Have You Looked into Your Heart. Vale appeared as himself in many movies such as in Goodfellas and Casino. Vale died in Palm Desert, California from natural causes, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Singers from New York City
title: Jerry Vale
